lines.text: So... what if the Go Wizard wanted to get the heck out of dodge?
That <c=#FF0000>Emergency Exit</c> spell! If there were a fire, he could've tried to use it to escape from Emmup!
So, once he started the fire, he let it get big enough to step through!
Hold on, hold on. You're gettin' ahead of yourself again.
What I want to know is what actually went up in flames. You're spinnin' some kind of story about motive.
Could be you're right. You're <c=#FF00FF>probably right.</c> But let's take things one at a time.
Yeah, yeah, you already said that. Gotta get hung up on every little detail, huh?
